The Support Center for Local Initiatives for Development and Assistance to Vulnerable Persons, "CIDEP" in acronym, is a non-profit association of Burundi law approved in 2011 by the Ministerial Ordinance N ° 530/108 of 3/02 / 2011. The Vision is the construction of a peaceful Burundi where households are actors of sustainable development. The Mission is to Contribute to the promotion of sustainable development in Burundi. The strategic objectives of CIDEP is to achieve its mission, the organization CIDEP works on four main objectives; Contribute to peacebuilding by promoting social cohesion through inclusive community events and community peace and social cohesion agreements; Promote the financial empowerment of RDExCs youth and women; Promote sexual and reproductive health from acommunity development perspective; Promoting fiscal responsibility and fiscal and budgetary governance at the local and national levels with the aim of contributing to sustainable promotion. The Valuesis the Creativity, Innovation, Collaboration, Transparency.
